snippet.title: Disgaea PC Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the Darkness, Level Up Evil this February on Steam!

For all of you new fans out there who are curious about Disgaea’s advent to the PC, check this out, dood! In this second official trailer, you’ll catch a glimpse of the strategic combat, game systems, over-the-top battle animations, and all-around zaniness that makes Disgaea legendary!

Make sure to check out the game page on Steam (http://store.steampowered.com/app/405900) and add it to your Wishlist, or head over and join the community page (http://steamcommunity.com/app/405900)!
